channel.title: Instalation ...
channel.description:
I folow this link [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/System_Requirements#System_Requirements[/url] And instal from Steam client library Steam SDK 2007 base . Than download BlackMesa.7z and now can not find [quote] Be sure the game is installed to this directory: \Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS [/quote] [b]I Do not have Steammapps but i do have C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods [/b] One more thing this page say [quote] " Please select the file you would like to download:
blackmesa.7z blackmesa-setup.exe " [/quote]
[url=https://fotkica.com/slike.php?slika=1_115250424_Bm.jpg]![](upload://tOLoCj551EkaJeClppYaQ7LDq8b.jpeg)[/url]
So should i download only one when i choose to download from this link [url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/download.html[/url] or should donload all 3 oh them like this one [url]https://www.gamefront.com/black-mesa-is-live-download-it-here/[/url]

item.title: Instalation ...
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Sky90po:

I folow this link https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/System_Requirements#System_Requirements
And instal from Steam client library Steam SDK 2007 base .
Than download BlackMesa.7z and now can not find
I Do not have Steammapps but i do have C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods

No need to worry about this. You already have steamapps.

Sky90po:

One more thing this page say

So should i download only one when i choose to download from this link https://www.blackmesasource.com/download.html or should donload all 3 oh them like this one https://www.gamefront.com/black-mesa-is-live-download-it-here/

I would say download the 3 files like GameFront. I prefer getting those files via torrent though because it is a lot faster than GameFront.

Read full topic

item.title: Instalation ...
item.dc:creator: Sky90po
item.description:
I folow this link https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/System_Requirements#System_Requirements
And instal from Steam client library Steam SDK 2007 base .
Than download BlackMesa.7z and now can not find

Be sure the game is installed to this directory: \Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS

I Do not have Steammapps but i do have C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods
One more thing this page say

" Please select the file you would like to download:

blackmesa.7z
blackmesa-setup.exe "

So should i download only one when i choose to download from this link https://www.blackmesasource.com/download.html or should donload all 3 oh them like this one https://www.gamefront.com/black-mesa-is-live-download-it-here/

Read full topic
